summary: Project is an SGO web app on Caffeine; current focus is getting Draft v53 successfully published to live and applying UI cleanup on the Account Status page (remove technical sections like Troubleshooting and Publishing & Deployment for guest/hotel users).
architectural_notes: Caffeine deployment/publish is handled by AI/system (no manual deploy button for end users).
known_issues: Publishing Draft v53 to live fails with generic 'AI was unable to implement your request / couldn't complete your request' error.

existing_features.title: Update the Account Status page to hide the "Troubleshooting" section from non-admin authenticated users; only admins should be able to see and use Troubleshooting tools.
Update the Account Status page to hide the "Publishing & Deployment" help section from non-admin authenticated users; only admins should be able to see Publishing/Deployment guidance.
Revise the Account Status page header/subtitle copy so it no longer advertises troubleshooting tools to non-admin users, while keeping all user-facing text in English.
Perform the platform publishing step to publish the currently deployed Draft Version 53 to live/production after applying the agreed UI changes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove/hide 'Troubleshooting' section from Account Status page for guest/hotel users (keep technical info admin-only if needed)
Remove/hide 'Publishing & Deployment' section from Account Status page for guest/hotel users (keep technical info admin-only if needed)
